content.webTitle: Are tennis players at the French Open allowed to scrape the mark where the ball landed?

fields.headline: Are tennis players at the French Open allowed to scrape the mark where the ball landed?
fields.bodyText: Watching the French Open tennis being played at Roland Garros, I saw a player scrape the clay court with his foot to indicate to the umpire where the ball had gone out on the baseline. Is this allowed? Veda Burrows, Scarborough Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
